review_blob: A nice balanced beer with just the right bitter edge for this style.  Smooth, easy drinking with a balanced hop.  A beer that makes you feel like youre having a beer, not drinking some watered down "name brand".

Truly an unusual blend for what I was expecting.  Smokiness is nicely there, but for my palate it went from a nice bitter touch to a, dare I say, too sweet after taste.  Smooth, but many complex flavors for my palate.  Chocolate, coffee hints, to a sweet floral or citrus blend.  I think with the right dish, this would be excellent, but for my tastes, sitting watching a movie, the nuts and other salty snacks werent a good match.  I can definitely see myself cooking with this though.  Gotta get a brisket for it now.
beer_name: Samuel Adams Imperial Series Wee Heavy
